alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:40PM EDT until April 01 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR ERIE AND CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 139 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near North East to 6 miles southeast of Meadville, moving east at 75 mph. Another area of damaging winds is moving out of Ashtabula County behind the leading line of thunderstorms. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. Tree damage was recently reported near Girard. A 62 mph wind gust was recently measured in Ashtabula County Ohio. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Conneaut, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, North East, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Linesville, Wattsburg, Adamsville, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Guys Mills and Pymatuning North. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
